unknown_assailant.name: Unknown Assailant
unknown_assailant.description: A shadowy figure with a knife, their movements jerky and unpredictable.

cornered_thug.name: Cornered Thug
cornered_thug.description: He looks more scared than you, which makes him dangerous.

hallucination.name: Shadow Self
hallucination.description: A dark reflection of yourself, whispering your failures.
